name.baseName: Casting ; Casting ; Aluminum ingot, copper ingot, magnesium ingot, zinc ingot, intermediate alloy ingot, other metal materials, refining agent, denaturant ; All sizes; NESPS2
铸造 ; 铸件 ; 铝锭、铜锭、镁锭、锌锭、中间合金锭、其他金属材料、精炼剂、变质剂 ; 熔炼(感应电炉/电阻炉及其他) ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution CastingisVenturi，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution CastingisVenturi，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业流程包括铸造多种类型的锭块，如铝锭、铜锭、镁锭、锌锭、中间合金锭和其它金属材料，使用感应电炉、电阻炉等熔炼技术，适用于所有规模的操作。这些锭块和合金通常用于制造和建筑行业，作为组件、结构和其他金属产品的原材料。数据集还概述了几种用于颗粒物 (PM2.5 - PM10) 的末端治理污染控制技术，可能包括板式静电除尘器、管式过滤、袋式过滤器、文丘里洗涤器、喷雾塔/水冲击浴、多管旋风除尘、单筒或多筒并联旋风器以及直接排放方法。这些技术的效率和操作参数详细说明，以确保在生命周期评估中进行准确建模。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码33-37文件，在完整版文件中第944页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isPlate electrostatic precipitator，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
